translations: 设想（envisage 的过去分词）；面对，正视

sentences.sentence: He envisaged a time when soldiers who are wounded fighting overseas are put in mobile surgical units equipped with computers.
sentences.translation: 他设想在某一天，海外作战受伤的士兵会被安置在配备有电脑的移动外科病房。

sentences.sentence: It is envisaged that the talks will take place in the spring.
Nicole didn't celebrate her 30th birthday as she had envisaged.
sentences.translation: 妮可并没有像她想象中的那样庆祝她的30岁生日。
